DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 , Randomised Double Blinded Placebo Controlled Study ASLAN003
DOC.detailed_description: This single-centre , placebo-controlled , randomised , double-blind study involve SAD MAD ASLAN003 healthy subject . The study divide two part : - Part A : SAD cohort 1 cohort ass food effect ASLAN003 PK . - Part B : MAD cohorts one cohort healthy elderly subject . There sentinel pair subject SAD Cohorts 1 , 2 3 dose first dose give rest subject respective cohort . In addition , 8 subject receive ASLAN003 fed fast condition
